 */

class Languages
{

    public const CESTINA = 2;
    public const AFRIKAANS = 3;
    public const ENGLISH_US = 4;

    public static function map(): array
    {

            static::CESTINA => 'Čeština',
            static::AFRIKAANS => 'Afrikaans',
            static::ENGLISH_US => 'English (US)',
        ];
    }
}
